mapper.update:
update ehr_jobpost
person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_department = #{sourceDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_post = #{sourcePost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_rank = #{sourceRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_report = #{sourceReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_location = #{sourceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_long = #{sourceLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_cost = #{sourceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_department = #{newDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_post = #{newPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_rank = #{newRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_report = #{newReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_location = #{newLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_cost = #{newCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_start_date = #{recordStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
record_end_date = #{recordEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_date = #{newDate,jdbcType=DATE},
is_change_salary = #{isChangeSalary,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_modify_user_name = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_change = #{isChange,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}

update ehr_jobpost set person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, source_department = #{sourceDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_post = #{sourcePost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_rank = #{sourceRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_report = #{sourceReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_location = #{sourceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_long = #{sourceLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_cost = #{sourceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_department = #{newDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_post = #{newPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_rank = #{newRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_report = #{newReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_location = #{newLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_cost = #{newCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_start_date = #{recordStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, record_end_date = #{recordEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, change_type = #{changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_date = #{newDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_change_salary = #{isChangeSalary,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_modify_user_name = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_change = #{isChange,jdbcType=TINYINT} is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
mapper.select:
select ehr_jobpost.*, np.employee_name AS new_employee_name, new_o.organization_name AS new_organization_name, sp.employee_name AS so_employee_name, so.organization_id AS organization_id, so.organization_name AS so_organization_name
FROM ehr_jobpost
LEFT JOIN ehr_person sp ON ehr_jobpost.source_report = sp.person_id LEFT JOIN ehr_organization so ON ehr_jobpost.source_department = so.organization_id LEFT JOIN ehr_person np ON ehr_jobpost.new_report = np.person_id LEFT JOIN ehr_organization new_o ON ehr_jobpost.new_department = new_o.organization_id WHERE ehr_jobpost.person_id=#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ehr_jobpost.is_deleted=0
select from ehr_jobpost record where record.person_id=#{personId} and record.is_deleted=0 and record.record_start_date is not null and record.record_end_date is null

select record.record_start_date recordStartDate,record.record_end_date recordEndDate,company.company_name companyName,record.new_post newPostId, person.post_id oldPostId,record.change_type changeType ,TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,record.record_start_date,record.record_end_date) as intervalDate from ehr_jobpost record
LEFT JOIN ehr_person person on record.person_id=person.person_id
LEFT JOIN ehr_company company on person.company_id=company.company_id
where
record.person_id=#{personId} and record.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY record.create_date desc
select * from ehr_jobpost record where record.person_id=#{personId} and record.is_deleted=0 and record.change_type=#{changeType}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ehr_jobpost ( person_id, source_department, source_post, source_rank, source_report, source_location, source_long, source_cost, new_department, new_post, new_rank, new_report, new_location, new_cost, record_start_date, record_end_date,change_type, cause, new_date, is_change_salary, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, last_modify_user_id, last_modify_user_name, last_modify_date, memo, is_change ) VALUES
( #{item.personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.sourceDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourcePost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceLong,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.sourceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recordStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.recordEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.newDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.isChangeSalary,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isChange,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
